--- In gladiator@yahoogroups.com, "Daniel Paul Hightower" 
<dph_of_rules@u...> wrote:
> What are your biggest frustrations when playing the game?

When I have really high DEX on a character (sometimes through 
cheating), it is impossible to get onto any teleporters.

Hunting for that last enemy generator.

When Thieves drop bombs liberally.

Gigantic key-puzzle levels.

When Ghosts gang up on me with Scare.

When Faeries surround me.

Not having enough money to be ready for the next scene.

When I try to melee-attack enemies, and I only end up shooting 
projectiles diagonally right past them.

When my own slime ends up blocking narrow passages.
